Our Mission

Our mission is to dramatically impact the efforts of reversing climate change and we realize that it is impossible to pursue this goal by simply reducing emissions. It is crucial that we implement means to effectively remove emissions before it is too late.

Our Vision

When you drive the Vexen CNV you will not only be reducing the amount of pollution emitted into our atmosphere, you will effectively be removing it. The world's first CNV is the first and most vital step to pursuing our vision of a Carbon Negative Era.
